name: LD37 - The ONE Room
description:
Entry for LD37. Theme: "One Room"

----------------------------------

Back then we could not think of a really fitting game for the theme so we played around the words and decided to make a dungeon crawler where your goal is to reach the ONE room, where the most precious treasure is kept. Can you beat the 10 floors and claim your prize?

3 distinct units with 3 different skills: 

  • The warrior (power attack, shield wall, bloodlust)
  • The wizard (firebolt, iceblock, teleport)
  • The archer (piercing, poison shot, camouflage)

You main problem will probably be the energy bar - which is basically hunger. It decreases each step and you must open chests to find food to recover it. The chests can also contain different gears and consumables.

The game is really unbalanced and the pace is... not good. But we achieved the core functionalities we wanted, and the result if somewhat fun. Hope you enjoy it!

----------------------------------

TEAM:

  • Fiote [Developer] (https://twitter.com/FioTactics)
  • PhanxGames [Artist]

----------------------------------

TECHNOLOGY:

The game was done in JavaScript. No gamelib was used.  No html5 either, just a LOT of divs with background-image and there you go!
